Articles.Content:
Anyone else got the idea to make a fast travel system for your Mun-Base? Mine didn\'t work btw =P

What I did was setting up a Mun-Base (5-6 Landers) near Mun-Equator and then sent a rocket into 4000m Mun-Orbit with a lot of ladders on it

Then I EVA\'ed Jeb and got him to 4000m height and waited there for my taxi-rocket... turned out it was a little faster than I anticipated

Then I thought about having a rocket in Mun-Stationary Orbit but apparently that isn\'t possible...

Anyone got any ideas? 8)
Yeah. Orbital velocity\'s a bugger. I\'d highly recommend doing this on Minmus, though. The orbital velocities are so low that capture would comparitively easy.

i like the idea, sounds hard to get in the ship moving that fast, but i think i want to try it anyway XD , kerbals can get realy high on the EVA pack, so the highest the altitude of the taxi the esier rigth? ..

oh just one question, how do you get down?... so you would need to use only 50% of RCS on the acent and other 50% on decent?
